passage_text: Keith /kei-th/ [1 syll.] as a boys' name is pronounced keeth. It is of Scottish and Gaelic origin, and the meaning of Keith is woodland, forest. The family name of hereditary earls marshals of Scotland from the 11th century. Baseball player Keith Hernandez; Rolling Stone Keith Richard; actor Keith Carradine.

Meaning of Keith. Irish name. In Irish, the name Keith means-warrior descending. Other origins for the name Keith include-Irish, Scottish, Welsh.The name Keith is most often used as a boy name or male name.

Meaning of Keith. Scottish name. In Scottish, the name Keith means-Wood. From the battleground. A surname and place name.. Other origins for the name Keith include-Scottish, Irish, Irish, Welsh.The name Keith is most often used as a boy name or male name. Scottish Name Meaning-Wood.

Irish Meaning: The name Keith is an Irish baby name. In Irish the meaning of the name Keith is: From the battlefield. Scottish Meaning: The name Keith is a Scottish baby name. In Scottish the meaning of the name Keith is: Wood. From the battleground. A surname and place name.
